A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was a great film! It went in an unexpected direction which I found to be far more interesting and refreshing! Mark Hamill was outstanding\, probably his finest performance! The film was definitely darker\, but maintained a sense of urgency! This film is the middle in a trilogy and it fulfills its role nicely by advancing the franchise and setting up a finale that will be epic! I would recommend ignoring all these negative audience reviews and enjoy this film.
